review: Excellent doctor. Super friendly who explained the diagnosis clearly without beating around the bush.

The doctor showed remarkable patience in listening to all the problems. His thorough examination of each issue was commendable. What really impressed me was he uses 3D models and computer images to explain the problems in a clear way. Overall very satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited doctor Utkarsh for the second time for a new ailment, given my extremely positive first visit, years ago. He is extremely patient, friendly and listens to your challenges. He took time and examined every aspect of my forearm pain. He even takes the effort of showing through images the medical condition and makes it crystal clear and gives confidence. Plus with his suggested simple medication I was releived within few days. I would highly recommend Dr. Utkarsh to anyone looking for orthopedic treatment.
reply_text:
Thanks Anurag for taking the time to share your kind words and positive review about your experience with me as your doctor.I deeply appreciate your feedback and am thrilled to know that you had a positive experience.
Regards 
Dr Utkarsh Pawar

review:

After operation  followup  also he gives proper advice 
I am recommending all to visit to Dr Pawar for knee replacement,

review: I received a good level of care and attention during my visit. The doctor was not only professional but also displayed a friendly and patient demeanour.  Greatly appreciate him taking the time to answer each query I had and ensuring that I understood the information given.

review: Dr Pawar very patiently listened to my back  and knee pain problem and examined me throughly. Without putting me through any tests and screening he diagnosed  my problem perfectly. review:
I visited dr Utkarsh Pawar for my knee pain. 
He explained everything to me very well . 
My knee was really painful and I thought I will have to undergo knee replacement but he got my X-ray done and treated me conservatively. He completely avoided unnecessary surgery. I was really happy and I’m pain free right now . 
I really recommend dr Pawar to everyone . *** **** **** *** **** *********** ********
reply_text: Thanks for your kind feedback

He is also specialized and experienced Hip, Knee and Shoulder Joint Replacement Surgeon. He deserves a Very High Recommendation.

review: I had recurrent shoulders dislocation since last 4 years.I did many treatments like physiotherapy, acupuncture,ayurvedic medicines,etc, but nothing was helping. I consulted dr utkarsh for the same and he advised me a surgery to stabilize my shoulder , which I did. Now it's been 6 months since surgery , i am back to normal activities and playing a badminton.  Thank you Dr Utkarsh for fixing my shoulder.
reply_text: Thank you for sharing your experience
